name: Runechild
description: Your body manifests natural runes that channel arcane power in luminous sigils.

1.name: Essence Runes
1.description: Gain essence runes that charge when you spend sorcery points; charged runes power your subclass features.

1.name: Runic Magic
1.description: Gain additional abjuration and transmutation spells at certain levels that don't count against spells known.

1.name: Glyph of Aegis
1.description: When you take damage, expend charged runes as a reaction to reduce the damage by 1d6 per rune.

6.name: Glyph of Aegis (Transfer)
6.description: As an action, transfer up to three charged runes to protect another creature, reducing the next damage it takes by 1d6 per rune.

6.name: Sigilic Augmentation
6.description: Expend a charged rune to gain advantage on a Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution check or saving throw (the saving throw option usable once per long rest).

6.name: Manifest Inscriptions
6.description: Expend a charged rune to reveal hidden magical glyphs, traps, or wards within 60 feet for 1 minute.

14.name: Glyph of Aegis (d8)
14.description: The die used for your Glyph of Aegis becomes a d8.

14.name: Runic Torrent
14.description: Expend two charged runes to convert a spell's damage to force and knock targets prone or push them up to 15 feet; once per rest.

18.name: Arcane Exemplar
18.description: Spend a charged rune to become pure magical energy, gaining flight, resistance to spell damage, healing when casting spells, and imposing disadvantage on saves against your spells.
